1,Complete Checkout Process for Single Item on SauceDemo,"Login, select an item, add it to the cart, fill out personal details, and complete the checkout process.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page '/inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on link itemTitles (ItemTitle) -> Navigate to page '/inventory-item.html'
Step 4: Click on button AddToCart
Step 5: Click on link ShoppingCart
Step 6: Fill out personal details on the checkout page

column2: - Step 1: Click on button Checkout -> Navigate to page '/checkout-step-one.html'
- Step 2: Click on input FirstName
- Step 3: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 4: Click on input LastName
- Step 5: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 6: Click on input PostalCode
- Step 7: Enter input value in input PostalCode
- Step 8: Click on input Continue

column1: Step 7: Click on button Finish -> Navigate to page '/checkout-complete.html'
Step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

3,Manage Cart and Checkout Process on SauceDemo,Login, add multiple items to the cart, remove an item, continue shopping, and complete checkout with personal details.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on div LoginCredentials
Step 3: Click on div LoginCredentials
Step 4: Login -> Navigate to page '/inventory.html'
Step 5: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart)
Step 6: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart2)
Step 7: Click on select ProductSort
Step 8: Click on link ShoppingCart -> Navigate to page '/cart.html'
Step 9: Click on button Remove
Step 10: Click on button ContinueShopping -> Navigate to page '/inventory.html'
Step 11: Click on link itemTitles (ItemTitle) -> Navigate to page '/inventory-item.html'
Step 12: Click on button AddToCart
Step 13: Click on link ShoppingCart
Step 14: Fill out personal details on the checkout page
